title: The Pieta in Ordinary Time: And Other Stories
description: *What happens when Seattle is destroyed in a nuclear holocaust?  *When all a young boy wants for Christmas is the left hand he lost in an automobile accident the year before?  *When a woman travels to San Diego to commit suicide after the overdose death of her only son?  *When a young man plots to humiliate his attorney father, running for public office, by taking a job in an adult shop?  *When a psychiatrist's bipolar patient invites him to become his copilot when the aliens come back for him in their time-space ship?  *When a priest hears the confession of a serial killer and is helpless to prevent him from killing again?  These and ten other stories are a smorgasbord of short fiction, inviting the reader on a journey of droll humor, philosophical contemplation, suspense, and terror.  Pour yourself a glass of Oregon Pinot or a cup of hot black coffee and enjoy!
author: William J.   Cook
